ygData.subject: Lambent stones
ygData.msgSnippet: Well i got my first Lambent stone last night. I had all the other pieces but that, and several people had offered to sell for 100 plat, but i told them all
ygData.messageBody:
Well i got my first Lambent stone last night. I had all the other pieces
but that, and several people had offered to sell for 100 plat, but i
told them all they would never get it. I got my stone for 15 plat.

The rogues all got together and set pricing for ravenscale, so that
people would not "farm it". Why not do the same for Lambent stones? Why
don't we all agree to only pay 20 plat or less for the stone. That is a
nice chunck of change for someone, and not out of the reach of bards
saving for gems for armor.

what do you think?


Uldar Ulfagson
15th bard, Rodcet Nife
(yes, I accidently put Innoruk on my last post... Doh!)
